name: University stories
description:
You left your hometown and entered the university where, as it turned out, many beautiful girls study. Find among them the one that you like the most.
Go on dates with girls and win their hearts.
University stories - an exciting animated game with lots of different girls.
As you get to know you will open more and more interesting pictures with them.
Game features:
Five fascinating stories with five different girls
The game is a mixture of three-in-a-row and a visual novel
Treat girls well! Your date may end before it even starts
To win a level, you need to make combinations to get additional game moves
Gallery of hot girls pictures
Pleasant soundtracks, individual for each girl
